message.title: Website blocked
message.description: The website you are trying to access has been blocked globally across organization for security reasons. For more information on the policy you can visit [link](https://ira.coauth.dev). Contact administrator, incase of any discrepancy.

message.title: Data disclosure disclaimer
message.description: As per the organizations policy. Please ensure that you do not enter any company sensitive information on these sites that you navigate hereforth. For more information on the policy you can visit [link](https://ira.coauth.dev).
